title: Creamy Tomato Basil Soup
description: A comforting, velvety tomato soup with fresh basil. Perfect with a grilled cheese sandwich on a chilly day.

ingredients.item: fresh basil leaves, plus more for garnish

instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in the canned tomatoes with their juices and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer.
Add sugar, salt, and pepper. Let simmer for 20 minutes to let flavors meld.
Remove from heat and add fresh basil leaves.
Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth. Alternatively, blend in batches in a regular blender.
Stir in heavy cream and return to low heat to warm through. Do not boil.
Taste and adjust seasonings. Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil leaves and a drizzle of olive oil.
